comment: Define the (strong) ultrafilter lemma, parameterized over base sets. A set ` X ` satisfies the ultrafilter lemma if every filter on ` X ` is a subset of some ultrafilter. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
